requirement: Avoid the disclosure of sensitive data in the token by using the authorisation code flow
Use a TLS ciphersuite that provides confidentiality and integrity protection
Validate the server TLS certificate per RFC 6125
Compare strings after removing JSON escaping
Compare strings without applying Unicode normalisation to any Unicode code point I neither the JSON string or the string it is being compared to.
Compare strings as a Unicode code point to code point equality comparison
Only allow a single ASCII space character (0x20) as the delimiter for lists of strings
Complete all cryptographic operations in full before terminating due to errors and not respond with detailed error information (in the case of an error) to the requestor
Provide controls to mitigate the threats described in the Security Considerations of the JWT specification
Sign then encrypt, if signing and encrypting JWTs
